wiki.content: According to the Run This Town Songfacts, the song features Rihanna, who provides the vocals for the hook and Kanye West. It was Rihanna's first musical appearance on a song since she hit the headlines after an altercation with her boyfriend Chris Brown. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the Run This Town Songfacts, the song features Rihanna, who provides the vocals for the hook and Kanye West. It was Rihanna's first musical appearance on a song since she hit the headlines after an altercation with her boyfriend Chris Brown.

track.name: Run This Town (feat. Rihanna & Kanye West)
